name: multiple_guids
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool guid_generator_tool.
Tool description: Efficient Guid generator, fast and flexible.
API description: Endpoint to retrieve a multiple GUIDs, returned as a a string array.
Required query string parameter: *number* - needs to be between 0 and 1000.
GET only query.
Return content-type is text/json.

number.description: The number of GUIDs to generate (must be between 0 and 1000).
